Articles.Content:
Hello I was planing to continue on with my original mission log thread I created back in 0.22 but since the update broke some of the mods I was using and were part of most of my spacecraft designs, so I decided to restart.

The Flag of UKSA.

Mission parametres:

Minimal space debris,

Most launch vehicles have to be reusable,

Minimal loss of life and

Missions must have a purpose.

Save corrupt please delete.

Edited February 8, 2014 by BritOpsGaming

Current astronaut roster;

Rocketry Division:

Jebediah Kerman,

Marcus Kerman,

Aerospace Division:

Max Kerman,

Daniel Kerman,

Robotic Division:

Bob Kerman,

Bill Kerman,

Edited January 1, 2014 by BritOpsGaming

Contents:

Centaur I Mission.

Edited January 1, 2014 by BritOpsGaming

UKSA - Mission logs.

Centaur I + KCS I mission.

Launch Information:

Launch time: Early morning 8:30am.

Launch Mass: 87.776 Metric tons.

Max launch acceleration: 15.65 m/s squared.

Launch TWR: 1.6.

Total delta V: 5240m/s atmosphere, 5802m/s vacuum.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Bob and Bill were ecstatic to find out that there mission proposal was selected for the agencies first mission but they consulted with the rocket division to create the Centaur I launch vehicle. The mission was a success that increased the budget for the next two robotic missions to complete the Kerbo-Synchronous Communications Network.

Edited January 1, 2014 by BritOpsGaming
